name: Pogo (itch) (JoonhoDev)
description:
a relaxing infinite game about jumping from wall to wall. satisfying and simple game-play, the perfect way to chill. 

controls:

use the (A) and (d) or (left Arrow) and (right Arrow) keys to rotate the player.

directions:

unzip the file, open the folder, and launch the application called, "Pogo". have fun!
